messages.title: NHS: CONDITION CRITICAL
messages.content: SHOCKING figures show waiting times at Addenbrooke's are the worst in the UK. It's taken the Tories and LibDems just five years to create an NHS crisis. They wasted £3 billion on a damaging NHS reorganisation and cut staff. Our NHS doctors and nurses are fantastic but they have been badly let down. The facts are very worrying: 60% of people say they can't get a GP appointment within two days while more people are being left waiting on trolleys at A&E.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will invest in 8,000 more doctors, 20,000 more nurses and 3,000 more midwives. Labour will guarantee you will be able to see a GP within 48 hours, which will help tackle A&E waiting times.

issues.health: SHOCKING figures show waiting times at Addenbrooke's are the worst in the UK. It's taken the Tories and LibDems just five years to create an NHS crisis. They wasted £3 billion on a damaging NHS reorganisation and cut staff.
